description:
Looking for a consultative, solution sales professional with experience selling EAM and CMMS software solutions to water and/or wastewater utilities and ESP consultants. Must be a self-starter that is comfortable working the full sales cycle: Prospecting, Lead handling, Discovery, Demonstrations, Contracting and Negotiation. A strong sales process approach for opportunity creation, advancement and closing is a must.

Requirements:
• Must be able to travel up to 30%
• Ideal candidates will have a strong network in the water industry.
• Industrial software sales experience
• Experience desired for tradeshow presentations, proactive pre and post-show activities.
• Ability to thrive in a small, dynamic teamwork environment is essential.
